operation.name: InsertOrUpdates
operation.sql: INSERT INTO auth_users (auth_key_id, user_id, hash, date_created, date_actived) VALUES (:auth_key_id, :user_id, :hash, :date_created, :date_actived) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE hash = VALUES(hash), date_actived = VALUES(date_actived), deleted = 0

operation.name: Select
operation.sql: SELECT id, auth_key_id, user_id, hash, date_created, date_actived FROM auth_users WHERE auth_key_id = :auth_key_id AND deleted = 0
